name: Urea
description: High nitrogen fertilizer used to promote leafy green vegetative growth.
function: Stimulates rapid foliage and stem development.
application_timing: Top dressing during active growth (2â€“6 weeks after emergence). Split applications recommended.
soil_type: Neutral to slightly acidic soils. Avoid on alkaline soils.
benefits: Boosts yield and overall plant vigor.

name: Ammonium Nitrate 34.5%
description: Nitrogen fertilizer containing both nitrate and ammonium forms for quick and sustained uptake.
function: Provides quick nitrogen uptake and long-term availability.
Enhances root growth and green leaf color.
More stable than urea under hot, dry conditions.
application_timing: Top dressing during rapid vegetative growth when moisture is adequate.
soil_type: Effective on acidic and sandy soils.
benefits: Quick visible results with reduced nitrogen losses.
Increases crop protein and chlorophyll levels.

name: Cereal Blend 6:23:23
description: Balanced fertilizer ideal for cereals that need strong roots, flowering, and grain filling.
function: Promotes root establishment and early growth.
Enhances disease resistance and grain quality.
soil_type: Ideal for loamy soils deficient in phosphorus.
benefits: Enhances root development and yield potential.
Improves crop maturity and grain uniformity.

name: Compound C 6:15:12
description: UCF NPK fertilizer for balanced plant growth and soil fertility improvement.
function: Supports root, shoot, and flower development.
Improves grain filling and fruit setting.
application_timing: Basal fertilizer applied before or during planting.
soil_type: Suitable for most agricultural soils, especially low-phosphorus soils.
benefits: Improves soil fertility and plant vigor.

name: Compound D 7:14:7
description: Starter fertilizer focusing on early crop development and strong root establishment.
function: Encourages early root growth and seedling vigor.
Supports leaf development and disease resistance.
application_timing: Basal fertilizer used at planting time.
soil_type: Best for neutral to acidic soils.
benefits: Prepares plants for later nutrient uptake.

name: High C 6:28:23
description: High-phosphorus and potassium fertilizer supporting flowering, fruiting, and seed formation.
function: Enhances grain filling and crop quality.
Improves plant strength and root-shoot balance.
application_timing: Applied before flowering or fruit setting (mid-growth stage).
soil_type: Ideal for phosphorus and potassium deficient soils.
benefits: Increases grain size, fruit weight, and sugar content.
Improves yield quality and storage properties.
